## AD Light - PhaserJS Game

[![PhaserJS](https://img.shields.io/badge/-PhaserJS-7A9F58?style=flat&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&logoColor=fff&labelColor=000)](https://phaser.io/)
[![Ludum Dare](https://img.shields.io/badge/LudumDare-57-f79122?labelColor=ee5533)](https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/57)
[![Play Ad Light on Itch.io](https://img.shields.io/badge/itch.io-Ad%20Light-fff3b0?logo=itch.io&logoColor=white&labelColor=fa5c5c)](https://j-tap.itch.io/ad-light)

Game made for [Ludum Dare 57](https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/57/ad-light), theme: **Depths**
<br>
Play on [itch.io](https://j-tap.itch.io/ad-light) or [ad-light.netlify.app](https://ad-light.netlify.app/)

### For developers

#### Used
- [PhaserJS](https://phaser.io/)
- [Phaser3 Rex plugin](https://rexrainbow.github.io/phaser3-rex-notes/docs/site/)
- [Bun](https://bun.sh/)
- [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)
- [Vite](https://vitejs.dev/)

##### Running the Project
```
bun install
bun run dev
```
##### Building the Project
```
bun run build
```
